DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of a new eye drop formulation in patients with dry eye disease.
DOC.brief_title: A Safety and Efficacy Study of a New Eye Drop Formulation in Patients With Dry Eye Disease.
DOC.criteria: Used artificial tears for dry eye Visual acuity of at least 20/32 (while wearing glasses, if necessary). Use of contact lenses in the last 3 months, or anticipated use of contact lenses during the study Herpes keratitis in the last 6 months Cataract surgery, laserassisted in situ keratomileusis [LASIK], or photorefractive keratectomy, within the last 6 months
